title: Remove SourceLink.Create.CommandLine
body:
This is no longer needed per the dotnet/sourcelink documentation, and even
without it I still see the sourcelink JSON in `MSBuildTaskHost.pdb`.

commit.message:
Remove SourceLink.Create.CommandLine

This is no longer needed per the dotnet/sourcelink documentation, and even
without it I still see the sourcelink JSON in `MSBuildTaskHost.pdb`.

nodes.body: @AR-May this is ready to go IMO but I'm a bit worried about some subtle implication so if I was still kitten I'd put it in its own insertion. Feel free to wait for Monday if you want me around to deal with fallout.
